channel.title: Adding Items to Shops on a 317
channel.description: Ok, how do i add items to a shop on a 317 server. the 2 npcs i wanna add items to are Miles and Giles, for pvp. How do i get to their shop items and stuff. i know how to add the ids but, what do i open to see the item codes they have in stock, and add items to it.

item.title: Adding Items to Shops on a 317
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

kay im free now.
so
open up your shops config, theres a bunch of shit there; look for the correct wanneShop and change the items there.
if this is hard unblock me on msn lol, i said the shit i said cause i was busy.
